content:
I'm thinking I found a bug in the IG Publisher... can someone confirm?
See this profile: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cda-ccda-2.2/StructureDefinition-2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.7.html
Notice the slice on templateId called "secondary".
Go to the "definitions" tab and search for "secondary". You can see the top-level element for the slice on "templateId", but neither of the children elements are showing up in the definitions tab for templateId.root and templateId.extension

So looking at the Snapshot this is nothing under templateId:secondary, which is why it is not showing up on the detailed descriptions tab.
I can't see anything wrong with the slicing...
@Grahame Grieve can you take a look? neither Sarah or I see anything wrong with the StructureDefinition, but the publisher isn't outputing what we're expecting...
